com.smartnsoft.droid4me.analytics

Interface AnalyticsSender<DictionaryType>

  • Type Parameters:
    DictionaryType - the type of the dictionary used when reporting events

    public interface AnalyticsSender<DictionaryType>
    A very basic abstraction of an agent which is able to send analytics.
    Since:
    2012.06.02
    Author:
    Ã‰douard Mercier
    See Also:
    AnalyticsLogger

    • Field Detail

      • log

        static final Logger log

    • Method Detail

      • logEvent

        void logEvent(android.content.Context context,
            java.lang.String tag,
            DictionaryType dictionary)
        Logs an analytics event.
        Parameters:
        context - the Android context this event is associated with
        tag - the tag to use when reporting the event ; it is not authorized to be null
        dictionary - the dictionary to use when reporting the event ; may be null

      • logError

        void logError(android.content.Context context,
            java.lang.String name,
            DictionaryType dictionary)
        Logs an error event.
        Parameters:
        context - the Android context this event is associated with
        name - the name to use when reporting the error ; it is not authorized to be null
        dictionary - the dictionary to use when reporting the error ; may be null

      • onStartActivity

        void onStartActivity(android.app.Activity activity,
                   java.lang.String tag,
                   DictionaryType dictionary)
        Logs the start or resume of an Activity or Fragment (i.e. an entity).
        Parameters:
        activity - the Activity the event applies on
        tag - the tag to use when reporting the event ; it may be null, but not empty
        dictionary - the dictionary to use when reporting the event ; may be null

      • onEndActivity

        void onEndActivity(android.app.Activity activity)
        Logs the end or pause of an Activity or Fragment (i.e. an entity).
        Parameters:
        activity - the Activity the event applies on
